ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tarot, Raven Hex, and the Skeleton Man are thrown into the world of werewolves, vampires, and reanimated corpses as the cursed gaming system, the Hex Box, makes an unexpected return. Only months until Tarot's wedding, she finds herself the bride to a monster!
